about.copyright: Не е свързано с Valve. Deadlock и логото на Deadlock са регистрирани търговски марки на Valve Corporation.
about.description: Специални благодарности на платформите и общностите, които правят този проект възможен
about.forModContent: за съдържанието с модове и общността
about.gamebananaDescription: Нашият основен източник на модове и гръбнакът на това приложение. GameBanana предоставя богата база данни с модове и API, който прави възможно преглеждането, откриването и изтеглянето на модове за Deadlock.
about.openSourceDescription: Изграден с невероятни оупен сорс технологии, включително React, TypeScript и много други библиотеки, които правят съвременните приложения възможни. Благодарим на всички, които са допринесли и поддържат проекта.
about.resetOnboardingDescription: Show the onboarding wizard again on next launch.
about.resetOnboardingSuccess: Onboarding will be shown on next launch
about.shadcnDescription: Красиви и достъпни React компоненти, които предоставят основата за нашия съвременен потребителски интерфейс. Копирайте, поставяйте и персонализирайте до съвършенство.
about.tailwindDescription: CSS фреймуърк, който поставя полезността на първо място и стимулира отзивчив дизайн и консистентно стилово оформление в приложението.
about.tauriDescription: Мощната платформа, която позволява това крос-платформено настолно приложение. Tauri съчетава най-доброто от уеб технологиите с нативна производителност и сигурност.
about.thirdPartyDisclaimerDescription: All mods available through this application are third-party content created by community members. Mods are not created, reviewed, verified, or endorsed by the Deadlock Mod Manager project. Install mods at your own discretion.
about.thirdPartyDisclaimerShort: Mods are third-party content not created, reviewed, or endorsed by Deadlock Mod Manager.
about.title: Благодарности
about.updateFailed: Не успяхме да проверим за актуализации, може да се наложи да актуализирате приложението ръчно.

mods.customModDisableBody: This is a custom mod that was manually added to your library. If you disable it, you won't be able to re-enable it automatically since it's not from our database. You would need to manually reinstall the original file or re-add it through the addon analysis feature.

onboarding.title: Welcome to Deadlock Mod Manager
onboarding.welcome: Let's get you set up with {{appName}}! This quick setup will help you get started.

background.detailedDescription: This plugin allows you to set custom background images for the entire application. You can use either a URL to an online image or upload a local image file. The plugin supports opacity and blur effects to customize the appearance. You can also choose whether to include the sidebar in the background effect.
background.title: Background
background.usageInstructions: To use this plugin: 1) Enable the plugin using the toggle, 2) Enter an image URL or click 'Choose Image' to upload a local file, 3) Adjust opacity and blur settings as desired, 4) Optionally enable 'Include sidebar' to apply the background to the sidebar as well.

bloodmoon.description: A dark theme with black-red gradients and crimson accents.

discord.applicationIdDescription: No setup required: this plugin uses our official Discord application.
discord.description: Shows your Deadlock activity on Discord.
discord.detailedDescription: Displays your Deadlock activity on Discord using Rich Presence. Simply enable the plugin and optionally customize the Details and State text visible on your profile.
discord.setupStep1: Visit the Discord Developer Portal and create a new application
discord.setupStep2: Copy your Application ID from the 'General Information' page
discord.setupStep3: Upload images as Rich Presence assets with matching key names
discord.setupStep4: Paste your Application ID above and enable the plugin
discord.showElapsedTimeDescription: Display how long you've been using the mod manager
discord.title: Discord Rich Presence
discord.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin, then optionally edit the Details and State text.

flashbang.description: Force Light Mode during a scheduled time window.
flashbang.detailedDescription: Flashbang mode switches the app to Light Mode during the configured hours, regardless of your theme setting.
flashbang.title: Flashbang Mode
flashbang.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin and choose start and end hour (0–23).

nightshift.description: A teal-accented cyberpunk theme designed for clarity and long gaming sessions.

plugins.renderActive: Plugin is active and running in the background

sudo.description: Advanced mod management tools for experienced users.
sudo.detailedDescription: Unlocks developer-oriented controls and experimental features. Some actions can modify files or bypass safeguards. Use with caution.
sudo.instructions: Browse mods on the left, select one, then use the right arrow to download and enable it. Select an installed mod on the right and use the left arrow to remove it. You can search both lists.
sudo.title: Superuser
sudo.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin to turn on Superuser Mode. Developer options and advanced tools become visible across the app. Disable the plugin to hide them again.

tea.description: A cozy beige theme created for the YouTuber and Twitch streamer Snipztea.

themes.customDescription: Create your own custom theme with your preferred colors and style.
themes.customThemeBuilderDescription: Build your own theme by selecting colors and styles.
themes.detailedDescription: Switch the app's visual style using curated presets. While a theme is active, the Background plugin is automatically disabled to avoid visual conflicts.
themes.exportCustomThemeDescription: Create a pre-defined theme entry using your current custom settings.
themes.lineColorDialogDescription: Adjust color using H, S, V or paste a hex value.
themes.name: Name
themes.preDefinedDescription: Choose from carefully crafted themes designed to enhance your experience.
themes.settingsDescription: Adjust appearance options and choose between curated presets or custom styles.
themes.themeDescription: Create your own themes or use curated presets.
themes.title: Themes
themes.usageInstructions: Open the plugin, choose a preset under 'Pre-defined Themes', then press Activate. Press Deactivate to return to the default look.

privacy.analyticsEnabledDescription: Help improve the application by sending anonymous usage statistics and feature analytics
privacy.blurStrengthDescription: Колко да се замъглява NSFW съдържанието, когато е видимо (пиксели)
privacy.description: Контролирайте как се показва и филтрира съдържанието, което не е подходящо за работа (NSFW).
privacy.disableNSFWBlurDescription: Показване на NSFW съдържание без замъгляване (съдържанието все още показва значка NSFW)
privacy.hideNSFWDescription: Напълно скриване на модове, маркирани като NSFW, от списъци и резултати от търсене
privacy.rememberPerItemChoices: Запомняне на избора за всеки елемент
privacy.rememberPerItemChoicesDescription: Запомняне, когато изберете да покажете/скрите конкретни NSFW елементи
privacy.showLikelyNSFWDescription: Показване на съдържание, което може да е NSFW, но не е изрично маркирано (отменя скриването)
privacy.title: Поверителност и съдържание

profiles.createDescription: Create a new profile to organize your mods. Each profile can have different mods enabled.
profiles.defaultProfileEditLimitation: Only the description can be edited for the default profile
profiles.deleteConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to delete the profile '{{profileName}}'? This action cannot be undone.
profiles.importDescription: Enter a Profile ID to import a shared profile from another user.
profiles.importError: Failed to import profile. Please check the Profile ID and try again.
profiles.importOptionsDescription: Choose how to save this imported profile:
profiles.importPreviewDescription: Review the profile contents before importing. Choose how to save this profile.
profiles.manageDescription: Create, edit, and switch between different mod profiles. Each profile remembers which mods you have enabled.
profiles.name: Name
profiles.nameAlreadyExists: A profile with this name already exists
profiles.noHardwareIdOrVersion: Cannot share profile: hardware ID or version information is missing
profiles.noModsIncluded: No mods are included in this profile
profiles.shareInstructions: Share this Profile ID with your friends so they can import your mod profile:
profiles.shareNoMods: Cannot share profile: no mods are enabled
profiles.switchUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while switching profiles

reports.description_plural: This mod has been reported {{count}} times

reports.detailsPlaceholder: Any additional information that might help...
reports.reasonDescription: Please provide a clear description of the problem
reports.submissionConfirmation: Your report has been submitted and will be reviewed by moderators.

validation.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 2000 characters
validation.reasonMaxLength: Reason must be less than 500 characters
validation.reasonMinLength: Reason must be at least 5 characters

settings.addonsBackupDescription: Create and restore backups of your installed addons. Backups are stored as compressed archives.
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the appearance of the application.
settings.audioVolumeDescription: Adjust the volume for audio previews and playback
settings.autoReapplyMods: Автоматично повторно прилагане на модове при стартиране на мениджъра на модове
settings.autoUpdateDescription: Automatically check for and notify about application updates on startup.
settings.autoexecDescription: Manage your autoexec.cfg file. Changes require game restart.
settings.autoexecPlaceholder: Add your custom console commands here...
settings.autoexecReadonlyNote: Note: Sections marked with 'DO NOT EDIT' are managed by the mod manager and will be restored automatically.
settings.autoexecReadonlySectionDeleted: Read-only sections cannot be deleted. They will be restored on save.
settings.autoexecSaved: Autoexec config saved successfully! Restart game for changes to take effect.
settings.confirmClearAllMods: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изчистите всички модове? Това действие не може да бъде отменено.
settings.confirmClearModsStateBody: This will remove all mods from the application but will NOT delete them from your game folder. You can re-scan your mods folder to restore them.
settings.createCustomSettingDescription: Добавете персонализирана настройка. Тези настройки ще бъдат добавени към играта като опции при стартиране
settings.customCrosshairsDescription: Enable or disable custom crosshair settings in the autoexec config. When disabled, the crosshair section will be removed from the autoexec file.
settings.defaultSortDescription: Изберете подреждането по подразбиране за страницата с Модове.
settings.deleteBackupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
settings.developerModeDescription: Enable developer mode to access advanced tools and debugging features
settings.flashbangDescription: Forces Light Mode between 8 PM and 8 AM, regardless of selected theme
settings.gameConfigDescription: Управление на архивирането, възстановяването и проверката на файла gameinfo.gi за безопасно модифициране.
settings.gamePathDescription: The path to your Deadlock game installation. The mod manager will auto-detect this, but you can manually set it if needed.

ingestTool.description: Automatically scan Steam cache directory for Deadlock matchdata files and send match data to the API
ingestTool.title: Matchdata Ingest Tool

settings.invalidGamePath: Invalid game path. Please select a valid Deadlock installation folder.
settings.languageDescription: Изберете предпочитания език за интерфейса на приложението
settings.languageSettingsDescription: Изберете предпочитания език за интерфейса на приложението
settings.launchOptionsDescription: Персонализирайте опциите за стартиране на играта. Тези опции се прилагат независимо от режима (Стандартен или с Модове).
settings.launchVanillaNoArgs: Стартиране на играта в стандартен режим без допълнителни аргументи
settings.pluginDescription: Manage plugins and integrations for the desktop app.
settings.restoreStrategyWarning: This action cannot be undone. Please choose carefully.
settings.systemSettingsDescription: Настройки на Мод Мениджъра. Тези настройки не влияят на играта.
settings.themeDescription: Choose between light, dark, or system theme
settings.toolsDescription: Полезни функции за управление на вашите модове
settings.valuePlaceholder: true или false или друга стойност

arcane.description: Елегантна тъмна тема с розово-червени светещи ефекти, вдъхновена от естетиката на Arcane.
arcane.customColorDescription: Изберете персонализиран акцентен цвят за темата Arcane.

ui.author: Author
ui.multipleVersionsAvailable: Different versions of the mod are available.
ui.name: Name

update.newVersionAvailable: A new version ({{version}}) is available. You are currently on version {{currentVersion}}.

warnings.obsoleteDescription: Този мод вече не е наличен в магазина за модове и може да не работи с текущата версия на играта.
warnings.staleModDescription: This mod has {{count}} unresolved reports and hasn't been updated since {{date}}. It may be broken with the current game version.
warnings.updateAvailableDescription: A newer version of this mod is available. Download again to get the latest files.
warnings.updatedRecentlyDescription: This mod's files were updated in the last 7 days.

whatsNew.title: What's New

features: 🛠️ Developer mode toggle with dedicated developer tools page for mod creators
🔌 Comprehensive plugin system - Background customization, Discord Rich Presence, Flashbang (scheduled light mode), Themes (including Nightshift), and Sudo (mod conflict detection)
🎨 New Bloodmoon theme with black-red gradients and crimson accents
📁 Folder-based profile management for better organization
🔄 VPK file replacement feature for rapid mod development iteration
📥 Overhauled download system for better performance and reliability
⚙️ Experimental features UI with user-specific feature flag overrides
🛠️ Ingest Tool to add your matchdata to the Deadlock API
🐛 Fixed download total size displaying as 0.00 B
📦 Mods no longer removed from addons folder in vanilla mode
0.10.0.title: Profile Management, Developer Tools, Plugins & Enhanced Features

features: 🔧 Fixed VPK numbering to fill gaps sequentially instead of appending to the end
📁 Fixed profile import not skipping file-tree dialog for multi-file mods
🔄 Fixed VPK file selection dialog appearing when re-enabling mods with multiple files
0.10.1.title: VPK & Profile Import Fixes

features: 🎯 Crosshair publishing feature - create, publish, and browse community crosshairs with a built-in generator
⚙️ Autoexec configuration editor - manage your autoexec.cfg file directly from the app
🔧 Improved cache ingestion efficiency and plugin asset handling
⌨️ Updated zoom shortcut key and improved shortcut display formatting
0.11.0.title: Crosshairs & Autoexec Support

features: 🎨 Custom crosshair UX improvements - option to disable and delete crosshairs from history
🌐 Japanese language support added to the application
🔧 Minor bug fixes and stability improvements
0.11.1.title: Crosshair UX Improvements & Japanese Support

features: 🔒 Auth refactor - improved authentication and authorization flow
0.12.0.title: Auth Refactor

features: 🔧 Fixed broken deep links
🔧 Improved logging in desktop app
🔧 Ensure we identify logged in users using their USER ID
0.13.0.title: Bug Fixes & Improvements

features: 📋 Add third-party content disclaimer as first onboarding step to meet code signing requirements
🌐 Add Bulgarian language support
0.13.1.title: Third-Party Content Disclaimer & Improvements

features: 📊 Added Sentry issue tracking for better bug reports
🔐 Fixed updater permissions issues
🛡️ Enhanced error reporting and diagnostics
0.2.0.title: Error Tracking & Permissions Fix

features: 🎨 Complete UI overhaul for better user experience
📦 Improved download management
⚡ Performance optimizations
🔄 Updated core dependencies
0.3.0.title: UI Refactor & Download Improvements

features: ✨ Refreshed user interface with improved navigation
📥 Enhanced download management system
🐛 Fixed mod deletion issues (thanks @Skeptic-systems)
🔧 Better error handling and user feedback
0.4.0.title: Better Download Management & UI Refresh

features: 🛡️ Fixed Windows crash issue with single-instance plugin
✨ Added this "What's New" dialog to showcase updates
⚠️ New outdated mod warning system for better mod management
🎮 Updated champion roster with latest Deadlock heroes
🔧 Fixed Custom Launch Options not respecting enabled/disabled status
🎨 Enhanced UI components and layout improvements
🔧 Various stability improvements and bug fixes
0.5.0.title: Stability & New Features

features: 🚀 Added virtualization to mods page for significantly better performance
🔧 Fixed "last updated" sort option not reflecting actual mod timestamps
🏷️ Added category and hero filters for better mod discovery
❌ Added clear button to search input for quick search reset
🔍 Improved filtering and searching functionality on the mods page
🐳 Resolved Docker compatibility issues
🎨 Enhanced mod card layout and styling
📖 Updated UI to acknowledge GameBanana as data source
⚡ Various performance optimizations and stability improvements
0.5.1.title: Performance & Bug Fixes

features: 🎵 Added support for audio mods - customize your Deadlock sounds
🚀 Improved launch options handling - no longer assumes "+" prefix requirement
🔧 Enhanced mod compatibility and installation process
⚡ Various performance optimizations and stability improvements
0.6.0.title: Audio Mod Support & Launch Options

features: 🔗 Added support for 1-click install links on GameBanana
0.6.1.title: Deep Links & Improvements

features: 📦 Multi-file download support - choose which files to install when mods have multiple archives
🔒 NSFW content filtering with user controls for safe browsing
⚙️ Advanced gameinfo.gi management for better mod compatibility
🎨 Brand new logo design and enhanced UI styling throughout the app
🚀 Improved launch button animations and enhanced settings layout
📍 Smart scroll position management - keep your scroll position while browsing mods
🔍 Enhanced search relevance and sorting capabilities for better mod discovery
0.7.0.title: Major Features & UI Refresh

features: 📤 Support for local mods is here!
🎵 Added volume slider for audio mod previews
🌍 Added 7 new languages: Arabic, German, French, Polish, Russian, Turkish, and Swiss German
🔽 Drag and drop mod files directly into the app
🌙 Light mode now follows your system theme automatically
✨ Filter settings now persist when navigating between pages, we also added "Exclude" filter mode
📱 Added bottom bar with status indicators for mods, downloads
0.8.0.title: Major Features & UI Updates + New Languages

features: 🔧 Updated to use HTTP plugin for all API calls for improved reliability
0.8.1.title: Technical Improvements

features: 🐛 Fixed various bugs and improved stability
⚡ Performance improvements and optimizations
0.8.2.title: Bug Fixes & Improvements

features: 📋 Mods ordering - organize your mods exactly how you want them
🔍 Local package scanning - automatically detect existing mods in your game directory
📊 Reporting system - help improve the app by reporting issues
🐧 Fixed Linux builds and scroll issues with pre-bundled GLS
✨ Some UI & UX polish
🔍 Search persistence through navigation
0.9.0.title: Mod Management & System Improvements

features: ⚙️ Game path settings - manually configure your game installation path for better compatibility
0.9.2.title: Settings & Configuration

whatsNew.welcome: Welcome to the latest version of {{appName}}!
